title: The Pirate Bay Full Backup [9.24.2015] - Small Descriptions
description:
This is a full backup of every magnet ever uploaded to ThePirateBay, stored inside one large SQLite database.

Everybody is encouraged to download and preserve this data, in order to keep all the torrents held within active in the event of another website takedown or failure.

This database is also useful for processing and searching files within TPB, without causing unnecessary server strain by doing it live.

THIS VERSION CONTAINS DESCRIPTIONS OF EACH MAGNET WHICH HAVE BEEN TRIMMED TO A MAX OF 200 CHARACTERS EACH. This may inhibit searching for text in descriptions, but allows for a much smaller table filesize. Download the full version if filesize is no issue. 
https://thepiratebay.gd/torrent/12483550/The_Pirate_Bay_Full_Backup_[9.24.2015]


Download and enjoy
